text: Leopoldo Sumaylo Tumalak (29 September 1944 â€“ 17 June 2017) was a Filipino Bishop of the Military Ordinariate of the Philippines He was the incumbent Military Ordinariate of the Philippines since 2005 until his death in 2017. He was born in Santander, Cebu, Philippines. Tumulak died on 17 June 2017 at a hospital in San Juan City, Manila, Philippines from pancreatic cancer, aged 72. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1944 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Filipino Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Cebu Category:Cancer deaths in the Philippines
title: Leopoldo S. Tumulak
